titles.title: For the relief of Kenneth R. Loeh of Royalton, Illinois.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 2/3/1993--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named individual for injuries sustained as a result of the administration of lysergic acid diethylamide by Army personnel in 1957.
